settings.title: AFTER 12 FASHION
settings.content: After 12 Fashions is located in Metro Atlanta, GA. We are owned by a Woman of God. At After12 we pride ourselves on delivering the most fashionable clothing for our divas. And, we carry sizes for all and all generation of clothing styles. We keep all seasons in all year round. So, don't worry if its Winter and you want something for Summer. We keep the stock updated. After 12 Fashions is growing everyday as a company. We thank you for shopping with us. We love our customers. And, your happiness and confidence in our brand is important to us.
